description: Minimal number of arcs whose reversal yields a transitive tournament.
comments: This is the "minimum feedback arc set" problem.The minimal number of arcs you need to delete to make a directed graph acyclic (maxed over all n-vertex directed graphs) is the same as the minimal number of arcs you need to reverse to make a tournament acyclic (maxed over all n-player tournaments).
